titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Transportation to issue a certificate of documentation and coastwise trade endorsement for the vessel BAGGER.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S4782)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

calendar.text: Committee on Commerce. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Commerce. Reported to Senate by Senator Hollings without amendment. With written report No. 103-342.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 584.

bill.summary: 4/25/1994--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to issue a certificate of documentation and coastwise trade endorsement for a named vessel.
